mapper.insert: insert into ORDERLIST (order_create_time, order_end_time, order_book_time, order_book_location, order_book_location_code, order_contact_mobile, order_contact_name, order_pic_url, order_description, order_price, order_urgent, order_urgent_bonus, order_user_id, order_type_code, order_status, order_section, order_type, order_refer_price, order_master_name) values (#{order_create_time}, #{order_end_time}, #{order_book_time}, #{order_book_location}, #{order_book_location_code}, #{order_contact_mobile}, #{order_contact_name}, #{order_pic_url}, #{order_description}, #{order_price}, #{order_urgent}, #{order_urgent_bonus}, #{order_user_id}, #{order_type_code}, #{order_status}, #{order_section}, #{order_type}, #{order_refer_price}, #{order_master_name})
mapper.select: select * from ORDERLIST where (order_status=1 or order_status=7) and order_user_id=#{order_user_id} order by order_create_time asc
select * from ORDERLIST where order_status="2" and order_user_id=#{order_user_id} order by order_book_time asc
select * from ORDERLIST where order_status="3" and order_user_id=#{order_user_id} order by order_end_time desc

select * from ORDERLIST where order_status=#{order_status,jdbcType=INTEGER} and order_type_code=#{order_type_code,jdbcType=INTEGER} and order_user_id not in (select blacklist_user_id from BLACKLIST where blacklist_master_id=#{order_master_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}) order by order_create_time

select * from ORDERLIST where (order_status=1 or order_status=7)
and order_type_code in
#{order_type_code}
and order_user_id not in (select blacklist_user_id from BLACKLIST where blacklist_master_id=#{order_master_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}) order by order_book_time

select * from ORDERLIST where order_status=#{order_status,jdbcType=INTEGER} and order_type_code=#{order_type_code,jdbcType=INTEGER} and order_user_id not in (select blacklist_user_id from BLACKLIST where blacklist_master_id=#{order_master_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}) order by order_book_time

select * from ORDERLIST where order_status=#{order_status,jdbcType=INTEGER} and order_book_location_code=#{order_book_location_code,jdbcType=INTEGER} and order_user_id not in (select blacklist_user_id from BLACKLIST where blacklist_master_id=#{order_master_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}) order by order_create_time

select * from ORDERLIST where order_status=#{order_status,jdbcType=INTEGER} and order_book_location_code=#{order_book_location_code,jdbcType=INTEGER} and order_user_id not in (select blacklist_user_id from BLACKLIST where blacklist_master_id=#{order_master_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}) order by order_book_time

select * from ORDERLIST where (order_status=1 or order_status=7) and order_type_code=#{order_type_code,jdbcType=INTEGER} and order_book_location_code=#{order_book_location_code,jdbcType=INTEGER} and order_user_id not in (select blacklist_user_id from BLACKLIST where blacklist_master_id=#{order_master_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}) order by order_book_time asc
select * from ORDERLIST where order_status="3" and order_master_id=#{order_master_id} order by order_end_time desc
select * from ORDERLIST where order_status="2" and order_master_id=#{order_master_id} order by order_book_time
select * from ORDERLIST where (order_status=1 or order_status=7) order by order_book_time
select * from ORDERLIST where order_status=1 order by order_book_time
select * from ORDERLIST where order_status=7 order by order_book_time
select * from ORDERLIST where order_status="2" order by order_book_time
select * from ORDERLIST where order_status="3" order by order_end_time desc
select * from ORDERLIST where order_status="4"
select * from ORDERLIST where order_status="5"
select * from ORDERLIST where order_status="6"
select * from ORDERLIST where order_type_code in (15000,15001,15002) order by order_book_time asc

select * from ORDERLIST where order_type_code in (15000,15001,15002) and order_master_id=#{order_master_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and order_status=#{order_status,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by order_book_time asc
select * from ORDERLIST where order_type_code in (15000,15001,15002) and order_status=#{order_status} order by order_book_time asc
select * from ORDERLIST where order_type_code in (15000,15001,15002) and order_master_id=#{order_master_id} order by order_book_time asc
select * from ORDERLIST where order_id=#{order_id}
select * from ORDERLIST where order_master_id=#{order_master_id} and order_status=#{order_status}
mapper.update: update ORDERLIST set order_book_time=#{order_book_time}, order_book_location=#{order_book_location}, order_book_location_code=#{order_book_location_code}, order_contact_mobile=#{order_contact_mobile}, order_contact_name=#{order_contact_name}, order_pic_url=#{order_pic_url}, order_description=#{order_description}, order_urgent=#{order_urgent}, order_urgent_bonus=#{order_urgent_bonus}, order_user_id=#{order_user_id}, order_type_code=#{order_type_code}, order_type=#{order_type}, order_refer_price=#{order_refer_price}, order_status=#{order_status}, order_remark=#{order_remark}, order_master_name=#{order_master_name} where order_id=#{order_id}

update ORDERLIST set order_master_id=#{order_master_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_master_name=#{order_master_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_price=#{order_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_status="2" where order_id=#{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ORDERLIST set order_score=#{order_score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_evaluation=#{order_evaluation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, order_end_time=#{order_end_time}, order_status="3" where order_id=#{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
